name: Hitman: Absolution - Elite Edition
description:
DLC!!!
If you have purchased the Elite Edition, you will have access to additional content, including DLC packs and bonus features.

Hitman: Absolution - Elite Edition includes the base game Hitman: Absolution and the following additional content:

Hitman: Sniper Challenge
The Agency Gun Pack
The Suit and Gun Collection
A one-hour "Making Of" documentary
A 72-page artbook, including concept art and storyboards, with a foreword by the game director, Tore Blystad
